abstract: International mediators present 13 proposals to end political crisis in Burkina Faso stemming from coup staged by those in military allied with former Pres Blaise Compaore; proposals are made even after mediators' meeting is stormed by military supporters, and will be presented at meeting in Nigeria of regional bloc known as Economic Community of West African States.
lead_paragraph: Hours after they were interrupted by supporters of the military, the mediators presented proposals to resolve the political crisis created by last week’s coup.

headline.main: Mediators in Burkino Faso Issue Proposals to End Strife
headline.print_headline: Mediators in Burkino Faso Issue Proposals to End Strife

snippet: Hours after they were interrupted by supporters of the military, the mediators presented proposals to resolve the political crisis created by last week’s coup.
